Title: Enacts the "facial identification and transparency in immigration enforcement act"
Summary: Enacts the "facial identification and transparency in immigration enforcement act"; requires federal immigration enforcement agents to identify themselves as such when conducting enforcement activities.
LawCode: Add ยง94-c, Exec L; add ยง60.80, CP L; add ยง4552, CPLR; amd ยง306, St Ad Proc Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, the criminal practice law, the civil practice law and rules, and the state administrative procedure act, in relation to requiring federal immigration enforcement agents to identify themselves as such when conducting enforcement activities
